data.title: ANKER Products – O & O Gadgets Limited
data.text:
Anker Innovations is the leading manufacturer of mobile chargers and accessories all over the world.

Anker was founded in 2011 in California, the brainchild of a group of friends working at Google. Fast forward a few years, Anker is now the industry leader in mobile charging—empowering the lives of millions of people around the world.

Anker’s vision is to create a world where mobile truly means mobile. A world where nothing holds you back from where you want to go, or what you want to do. Anker’s range of chargers and accessories remove the limitations of your mobile devices, giving you the freedom to enjoy life and savour the experience.

In January 2017, O & O Gadgets Limited, a company synonymous to good quality gadgets and accessories went into partnership with Anker to become the first authorised distributor of Anker products in Nigeria. Now Anker products are closer to you at more affordable prices.

-26%
